name: Coherent Breathing
description: 5-second inhale, 5-second exhale for heart rate variability.
explanation: Breathing at 6 breaths per minute optimizes heart rate variability and promotes cardiovascular coherence.
when_to_use: Daily practice for stress resilience, before meditation, or for general wellbeing.

round_messages.text: Find your natural rhythm. Breathe smoothly without forcing.
You're in the flow. Notice the calming effect on your heart rate.

pre_session.text: This is a gentle, sustainable breathing pattern.
Focus on smooth, even breaths rather than deep ones.

on_start.text: Begin breathing at a comfortable 5-5 rhythm.

on_end.text: Wonderful! Your nervous system is now more balanced.
Regular practice enhances stress resilience over time.

cautions: This technique is very gentle and suitable for daily practice.
Stop if you feel any discomfort and return to natural breathing.
